name: GlowRadioIreland
0:
”Alexa, play glow radio”
”Alexa, open glow radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: glow radio
des: Glow Radio is Ballinasloe’s community station dedicated to bringing music, local news, and vibrant events to the heart of town. This season, Glow Radio aims to make a meaningful impact by raising funds to illuminate Ballinasloe’s Christmas with dazzling lights. Tune in online, on mobile apps, or simply say, "Alexa, play Glow Radio." Join us in brightening the season and supporting the community!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
